title: 2013년 Anthony Tamanha Rios v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Anthony Tamanha Rios v. State. 판결일: 2013-08-19. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Anthony Tamanha Rios v. State
**판결일**: 2013-08-19
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

                    In The
              Court of Appeals
Sixth Appellate District of Texas at Texarkana


                  No. 06-13-00059-CR



        ANTHONY TAMANHA RIOS, Appellant

                           V.

           THE STATE OF TEXAS, Appellee



         On Appeal from the 241st District Court
                 Smith County, Texas
             Trial Court No. 241-1551-12




       Before Morriss, C.J., Carter and Moseley, JJ.
      Memorandum Opinion by Chief Justice Morriss
                                     MEMORANDUM OPINION
        Anthony Tamanha 1 Rios entered an open plea of guilty to aggravated robbery, was

convicted of the offense and sentenced to forty years’ imprisonment. Rios’ attorney on appeal 2

has filed a brief which states that he has reviewed the record and has found no issues that could

be raised. The brief sets out the procedural history and summarizes the evidence elicited during

the course of the proceeding. Meeting the requirements of Anders v. California, counsel has

provided a professional evaluation of the record demonstrating why there are no arguable

grounds to be advanced. Anders v. California, 386 U.S. 738, 743–44 (1967); In re Schulman,

252 S.W.3d 403, 406 (Tex. Crim. App. 2008) (orig. proceeding); Stafford v. State, 813 S.W.2d

503, 509–10 (Tex. Crim. App. 1981); High v. State, 573 S.W.2d 807, 812–13 (Tex. Crim. App.

[Panel Op.] 1978).

        Counsel mailed a copy of the brief to Rios June 12, 2013, along with his mo...
